inclusion.criterion: Patients undergoing hemodialysis in 48 dialysis units that have been identified as continuing to reuse dialyzers processed with peracetic acid-based disinfectant (Renalin®), as of February 1, 2007.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Hemodialysis patients not currently reusing reprocessed dialyzers
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a neonate with uncomplicated jaundice, which may require phototherapy.
